About JEPS

The JEPS bulletin is a blog about recent developments and innovations in methodology, academic writing, scientific publishing as well as a platform to share experiences on networking and collaborations. It is run by the editors of the peer reviewed, open access Journal of European Psychology Students.

JEPS Bulletin  •  2015  •  jeps.efpsa.org
